text: André Zwoboda (1910–1994) was a French screenwriter, producer and film director.Rège p.476 ==Selected filmography== ===Director=== * Life Belongs to Us (1936) * François Villon (1945) * Captain Ardant (1951) ===Producer=== * Black Girl (1966) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Rège, Philippe. Encyclopedia of French Film Directors, Volume 1. Scarecrow Press, 2009. ==External links== * Category:1910 births Category:1994 deaths Category:French male screenwriters Category:20th-century French screenwriters Category:Film directors from Paris
title: André Zwoboda
